calloutBox.title: Kindhearted Kangaroos
calloutBox.subTitle: 24 months to 26 months
calloutBox.content: Our Kindhearted Kangaroos program has seven toddlers ranging from approximately 24 months through approximately 26 months old. We have two consistent and nurturing staff caring for our toddlers daily.

mainContent.title: Program Details
mainContent.content: During their time in the Kindhearted Kangaroos classroom, they will experience a morning circle time, small group activities centered around art, colors/shapes and texture table, and an outside recess time. Before leaving our Kindhearted Kangaroos classroom, we would like the children to have a solid foundation of colors and shapes. Each child in our Kindhearted Kangaroos classroom is taking one nap a day, enjoying our nutritional menu, and learning to use utensils. Each child will be given an opportunity to be introduced to or continuing to work on potty training as well.
list: Feeding, naps, and toileting are recorded daily
Personal cot and storage area provided
Parents provide an extra set of clothes, a crib sheet, and diapers
Special art and other age development projects
Weekly Bible stories and prayers before meals
